channel.title: Prevent Adding Signature Images And -->Links<-- modification
channel.description:
http://custom.simplemachines.org/mods/index.php?mod=921
Would that be helpful for moparscape? This mod enables the admin to enable/disable links completely OR unless the user has made a certain number of posts. (In sigs) If not, lock it. No need for a huge discussion.

item.title: Prevent Adding Signature Images And -->Links<-- modification
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

You can stop posting now imo.
Moparisthebest has answered.

Read full topic
item.source: Prevent Adding Signature Images And -->Links<-- modification

item.title: Prevent Adding Signature Images And -->Links<-- modification
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“God of Ikiliki, post:7, topic:148657”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=203832.msg1799950#msg1799950 date=1191531278]
Yes, it is the:

Signature Settings Mod 1.0
[/quote]
Since when does that modification disable links in sigs?
It never did for me.[/quote]

You can disable any or all BBcode, and since url is bbcode it can disable links. Of course only if it worked.

Read full topic
item.source: Prevent Adding Signature Images And -->Links<-- modification

item.title: Prevent Adding Signature Images And -->Links<-- modification
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

[quote=“FastBawlz, post:9, topic:148657”][quote author=God of Ikiliki link=topic=203832.msg1803463#msg1803463 date=1191640642]
Since when does that modification disable links in sigs?
It never did for me.
[/quote]

[quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=203832.msg1797746#msg1797746 date=1191447424]
I already have a mod that can supposedly block links and all sorts of other tags, but it doesn’t work.
[/quote][/quote]
Maybe it doesn’t work because it’s bugged?

Read full topic
item.source: Prevent Adding Signature Images And -->Links<-- modification

item.title: Prevent Adding Signature Images And -->Links<-- modification
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

[quote=“Enjoy me now, post:5, topic:148657”]you got your wanted after all that sriving you came uot on top.

lol[/quote]
Is that even english?

I think that as long as bad links are reported and staff takes care of it then there’s no need for another mod for mopar to update every time the forum needs an update.

Read full topic
